actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Transportation and Hazardous Materials.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Transportation and Hazardous Materials

official_title: To amend the Comprehensive Environmental Response, Compensation, and Liability Act of 1980 to exempt a Federal department, agency, or instrumentality from liability under that Act when a facility is conveyed to the department, agency, or instrumentality due to bankruptcy, foreclosure, tax delinquency, abandonment, or similar means.
short_title: Federal Custodial Responsibility Protection Act of 1991
subjects: Liability for toxic substances pollution damages

summary.text: Federal Custodial Reponsibility Protection Act of 1991 - Amends the Comprehensive Environmental Response, Compensation, and Liability Act of 1980 (CERCLA) to exempt a Federal agency from liability under CERCLA where title or control of a facility was conveyed to such agency as a result of bankruptcy, foreclosure, or similar means.

titles.title: Federal Custodial Responsibility Protection Act of 1991

To amend the Comprehensive Environmental Response, Compensation, and Liability Act of 1980 to exempt a Federal department, agency, or instrumentality from liability under that Act when a facility is conveyed to the department, agency, or instrumentality due to bankruptcy, foreclosure, tax delinquency, abandonment, or similar means.
